## File structure
```{r}

dataset_metadata <- read_csv("run_settings/20210928_settings.csv")

data_paths <- read_csv("run_settings/20210928 all_datasets.csv")

file_structure <-
  create_folder_structure(dataset_id = dataset_metadata$dataset_id,
                          dataset_run_id = dataset_metadata$version,
                          main_folder = "results/Clustering_results",
                          folders = c("data" = "data", 
                                      "svg" = "svg",
                                      "treemap" = "svg/treemap",
                                      "heatmap" = "svg/heatmap",
                                      "enrichment" = "enrichment",
                                      "clustering" = "clustering"))
```


## Load clustering data

```{r}

clustering_data <- 
  file_structure %>% 
  map(function(x) x$clustering) %>% 
  map(function(x) {
    file_ <- paste(x, "final_consensus.tsv", sep = "/")
    if(file.exists(file_)) {
      read_tsv(file_)
    } else {
      NULL
    }
  }) %>% 
  bind_rows(.id = "dataset_id") %>% 
  mutate(cluster = as.character(cluster)) 


```

## Load enrichment data

```{r}

enrichment_data <-

    } else {

    }
  }) %>%

```


# Bubble heatmaps

```{r}

bubble_heatmap_settings <- 
  enrichment_data %>%
  filter(!test_type %in% c("KEGG",
                           "GO_BP_original",
                           "GO_CC_original",
                           "GO_MF_original",
                           "GO_BP_simplified",
                           "GO_CC_simplified",
                           "GO_MF_simplified",
                           "reactome")) %>% 
  group_by(dataset_id, test_type) %>% 
  summarise(bubbles = length(ID),
            clusters = n_distinct(cluster),
            terms = n_distinct(Description)) %>% 
  ungroup()

cluster_levels <- 
  clustering_data %>% 
  select(dataset_id, cluster) %>% 
  distinct() %>% 
  arrange(dataset_id, as.numeric(cluster))


plots <- 
  lapply(1:nrow(bubble_heatmap_settings), 
         function(i) {
           i <<- i
           dataset_id_ <- 
             bubble_heatmap_settings$dataset_id[i]
           test_type_ <- 
             bubble_heatmap_settings$test_type[i]
           
           filename <- 
             paste(dataset_id_,
                   test_type_,
                   "bubble.pdf")
           
           
           plot_data <- 
             enrichment_data %>% 
             filter(dataset_id == dataset_id_,
                    test_type == test_type_)
    
           plot_levels <-
             cluster_levels %>% 
             filter(dataset_id == dataset_id_) %>% 
             pull(cluster)
           
           plot_clustering <- 
             plot_data %>% 
             select(cluster, ID, odds_ratio) %>% 
             spread(ID, odds_ratio, fill = 0) %>% 
             column_to_rownames("cluster") %>%
             list(tissue = t(.), 
                  cluster = .) %>%
             map(. %>% 
                   dist(method = "binary") %>% 
                   hclust(method = "ward.D2"))
           
           plot_order <- 
             list(cluster = unique(with(plot_clustering$cluster,
                                          labels[order]),
                                   plot_levels),
                  ID = with(plot_clustering$tissue,
                                     labels[order]))
           
           plot <- 
             plot_data %>%
             ungroup() %>% 
             mutate(cluster = factor(cluster,
                                     plot_order$cluster),
                    ID = factor(ID,
                                plot_order$ID)) %>%
             ggplot(aes(ID, cluster, 
                        size = odds_ratio, fill = odds_ratio)) +
             
             geom_point(shape = 21,
                        show.legend = T) +
             theme_bw() +
             theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = -90, hjust = 0, vjust = 0.5),
                   legend.position = "right") +
             # coord_fixed() +
             scale_fill_gradient(name = "Odds ratio",
                                 low = "white", high = "orangered") + 
             scale_size_continuous(name = "Odds ratio", 
                                   range = c(1, 4)) +
             ggtitle(paste(dataset_id_, "-", test_type_))
           ###
           
           column_width <- (1/30)#(1/53)
           plot_n <- length(plot_order$ID)
           plot_scaling_factor_row <- column_width * plot_n
           
           plot_n_col <- length(plot_order$cluster)
           plot_scaling_factor_col <- column_width * plot_n_col
           
           # 
           # plot_widths <- 
           #   c(3, length(plot_n)) %>% 
           #   {. * column_width} %>% 
           #   {. / max(.)}
           
           plot_width <- 
             1 + 4 * plot_scaling_factor_row
           plot_height <- 
             2 + 4 * plot_scaling_factor_col
           
           ggsave(paste0("results/TEMP/", filename),
                  width = plot_width, height = plot_height)
           
         })



```
